info.title: Travelbooking BD
info.desc: Travelbooking BD is one of the largest travel / hotel booking agency in Bangladesh. Project was to make a booking system where users can search for hotels and packages and book and admins can process their booking as well as many other things within the application.
skiils: Good sense of design and UX
responsibilities: Refactor lagacy code to a modular architecture
Develop a modular REST Api
Design and develop backend application as per spec
Design frontend UI, email template, invoice pdf
Add and update new features to api and application
Deploy application to server and maintain

info.title: GEIST Foundation
info.desc: GEIST Foundation is established with prime objective of improving global competence among students and educators globally, especially state alumnus community.
responsibilities: Custom plugin coding
Extending plugin / theme options
Improve speed and site deployment
Making admin panel user friendly

info.title: Golden Son Limited
info.desc: Golden Son Limited is one of the country’s leading engineering companies involved with manufacturing, importing and exporting of a variety of products.
responsibilities: Make a wordpress like admin panel
Desing CMS architecture and implement in application
Design frontend UI and admin UI
Make site user friendly

info.title: We Are Tigers
info.desc: WeAreTigers.com.bd is unofficial cricket fan portal for Bangladesh Team powered by Robi. The portal provides latest updates and news on team
responsibilities: Building a custom admin panel to manage content
Desing architecture and implement in application
Design frontend UI and admin UI
Implement new features on regular basis

info.title: Bengal Eboi
info.desc: Bengal Eboi is the first Bangladeshi e-commerce site that sells digital book directly from the authors. The project is power by Bengal Foundation
responsibilities: Researching and choosing right cms for the project
Implement clients requirement within the cms
Design frontend UI and email template
Implement payment processors
Implement custom features on existing cms

info.title: Ibana Way
info.desc: Ibana is an organization that seeks to solve social challenges by instilling Islamic principles. The organization’s goal is to contribute in building a better nation through sincere effort and innovative means.
responsibilities: Making a user friendly wordpress portal
Customizing theme / plugins
Building custom plugins

info.title: Team Engine Limited
info.desc: Team Engine Limited is a for-profit social good company working from year 2010. Using power of information, communication, innovation, activism and entrepreneurship we are currently working on: Entrepreneurship development and SME support, Public Health communications and solutions, preservation and distribution of cultural work, solutions for Socially Excluded groups.
responsibilities: Custom website design and developement
Implement UI designto website

info.title: GoBDGo Limited
info.desc: GoBDGo Limited is a travel agency in Bangladesh and the project was to make theme a custom website where they can post their custom packages that their users can choos to book.
responsibilities: Custom Wordpress website design and developement
Wordpress theme and plugin implementation
